chunked_vad.lyrics_text: Every morning when you come downstairs There's a mess but I don't care No makeup on and shining so bright My old sweatshirt never fit so right
There's a mess but I don't care No makeup on and shining so bright My old sweatshirt never fit so right Dancing around to the radio
No makeup on and shining so bright My old sweatshirt never fit so right Dancing around to the radio Humming the words that you don't know
My old sweatshirt never fit so right Dancing around to the radio Humming the words that you don't know Cause I'm finding an angel off my list
Dancing around to the radio Humming the words that you don't know Cause I'm finding an angel off my list Thinking that it don't get no better than this
Humming the words that you don't know Cause I'm finding an angel off my list Thinking that it don't get no better than this You make loving you easy
Cause I'm finding an angel off my list Thinking that it don't get no better than this You make loving you easy You make loving you all I wanna do
Thinking that it don't get no better than this You make loving you easy You make loving you all I wanna do Every little smile and every little touch
You make loving you easy You make loving you all I wanna do Every little smile and every little touch Reminds me how just how much it all makes
You make loving you all I wanna do Every little smile and every little touch Reminds me how just how much it all makes Loving you easy
Every little smile and every little touch Reminds me how just how much it all makes Loving you easy Wrapped around me late at night
Reminds me how just how much it all makes Loving you easy Wrapped around me late at night Pillow talk by candle light
Loving you easy Wrapped around me late at night Pillow talk by candle light Gonna slow this down and make it last
Wrapped around me late at night Pillow talk by candle light Gonna slow this down and make it last The best things fly by us so fast
Pillow talk by candle light Gonna slow this down and make it last The best things fly by us so fast You make loving you easy
Gonna slow this down and make it last The best things fly by us so fast You make loving you easy You make loving you all I wanna do
The best things fly by us so fast You make loving you easy You make loving you all I wanna do Every little smile and every little touch
You make loving you easy You make loving you all I wanna do Every little smile and every little touch Reminds me how just how much it all makes
You make loving you all I wanna do Every little smile and every little touch Reminds me how just how much it all makes Loving you easy
Every little smile and every little touch Reminds me how just how much it all makes Loving you easy Oh, I wanna sing it again

Oh, I wanna sing it again You make loving you easy You make loving you all I wanna do Every little smile and every little touch
